rules.description: Opt Mode (A + Key / Option Layer, No Trackpad)
Shift+Opt Mode (S + Key / R Colemak Layer, No Trackpad)
Shift Mode (D + Key / S Colemak Layer, No Trackpad)
Movement Mode (F + Key / T Colemak Layer, No Trackpad)
Cursor Mode (G + Key / D Colemak Layer, No Trackpad)
Delete Mode (J + Key / N Colemak Layer)
Nav Mode (K + Key / E Colemak Layer)

rules.description: Kit Mode (N + Key / K Colemak Layer)
Semicolon Mode (; + Key / O Colemak Layer / Special Chars)
Period Mode (. + Key) - Focus or Open URLs
Comma Mode (, + Key) - Always Open New Tab
Launch Mode (F24 Tap Alfred, Hold Layer / U + Key Layer)

to.shell_command: /Users/johnlindquist/.config/scripts/wezterm_run.sh "cd ~/research && x --append-system-prompt='Research the users query then write the result to a markdown file ./<shortened-slugified-query>.md'"
